class.name: SymbolAdvancedTableMode
class.documentation: Here comes the description of the SymbolTableMode object

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_selection_type
parameter.documentation: Technique to use to calculate the shading band levels.
parameter.migration: New Magics: Parameter contour_level_selection_type sent to new Magics[IsoPlot].

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_min_value
parameter.documentation: Min value to plot

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_max_value
parameter.documentation: Max value to plot

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_level_count
parameter.documentation: Count or number of levels to be plotted. Magics will try to find "nice levels", this means that the number of levels could be slightly different from the requested number of levels

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_level_tolerance
parameter.documentation: Tolerance: Do not use "nice levels" if the number of levels is really to different [count +/- tolerance]

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_interval
parameter.documentation: Interval in data units between different bands of shading

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_reference_level
parameter.documentation: Level from which the level interval is calculated

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_level_list
parameter.documentation: List of shading band levels to be plotted

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_colour_method
parameter.documentation: Method of generating the colours of the bands in polygon shading

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_max_level_colour
parameter.documentation: Highest shading band colour

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_min_level_colour
parameter.documentation: Lowest shading band colour

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_colour_direction
parameter.documentation: Direction of colour sequencing for plotting (CLOCKWISE/ ANTI_CLOCKWISE)

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_colour_list
parameter.documentation: List of colours to be used in symbol plotting

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_colour_list_policy
parameter.documentation: What to do if the list of colours is smaller than the list of intervals: lastone/cycle

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_marker_list
parameter.documentation: List of markers to be used in symbol plotting

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_marker_name_list
parameter.documentation: List of markers to be used in symbol plotting symbol

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_marker_list_policy
parameter.documentation: What to do if the list of markers is smaller than the list of intervals: lastone/cycle

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_height_method
parameter.documentation: Method of generating the height

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_height_max_value
parameter.documentation: Maximum height to use

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_height_min_value
parameter.documentation: Mininimum height to use

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_height_list
parameter.documentation: List of heights to be used

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_height_list_policy
parameter.documentation: What to do if the list of heights is smaller than the list of intervals: lastone/cycle

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_text_list
parameter.documentation: Text to display

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_text_list_policy
parameter.documentation: What to do if the list of text is smaller that the list of intervals lastone: reuse the last one, cycle: return to the fisrt one

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_text_font
parameter.documentation: Font to use for text plotting.

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_text_font_size
parameter.documentation: Font size

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_text_font_style
parameter.documentation: Font Style

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_text_font_colour
parameter.documentation: Symbol Colour

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_text_display_type
parameter.documentation: How to display text none:do not display it centre : display it instead of the symbol, right : attached it to the right of the symbol, top : attached it to the top of the symbol, bottom: attached it to the bottom of the symbol,

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_outlayer_method
parameter.documentation: outlayer method

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_outlayer_min_value
parameter.documentation: outlayer min value

parameter.name: symbol_advanced_table_outlayer_max_value
parameter.documentation: outlayer max value
